Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Behead \Be*head"\, v. t. [imp. & p. p. {Beheaded}; p. pr. & vb. n. {Beheading}.] [OE. bihefden, AS. behe['a]fdian; pref. be- + he['a]fod head. See {Head}.] To sever the head from; to take off the head of. [1913 Webster]
beheaded adj : having had the head cut off; "the beheaded prisoners" [syn: {decapitated}]
